title: Need help! Cannot launch the game!
body:
Hey everyone!

I really need help. I cannot launch the game (not the client but when entering a game), it just doesn't launch it.

replies.body:
The most common cause for not being able to load into a match is if your client cannot establish a stable link to the game server. This is often caused by local network settings that don't play well with League, so I recommend checking out our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps helped at all.
Hey. Seems like it was some problem with my windows. I reinstalled the game and worked. Thanks for replying!
